p: Studies of the efficacy of favipiravir on influenza in animals have been performed in our biosafety level 3 laboratory, and sterile and pyrogen-free distilled water for injections was used for drinking to ensure traceability. As we have experience in conducting a pharmacological study for a famciclovir approval application in Japan, the efficacy and validation studies of favipiravir were conducted in mice and ferrets using the influenza infection system described above in our laboratory.
